MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML7 postcode area of Harthill, affecting properties in Dyke Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 9:40PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault near to Dykes Road substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:40AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 00:30AM on 16 November 2020.
